Title: Login fails with valid credentials
Description: Users report being unable to log in despite correct email/password. Error: 'Invalid credentials' appears.

Title: Cart total not updating after quantity change
Description: When increasing item quantity, displayed total remains unchanged until page refresh.

Title: Stripe test payment succeeds but no order is created
Description: Payment processes successfully, but backend does not persist order in database.

Title: Product image upload fails over 2MB
Description: Large files fail silently during admin product creation. No error message shown.

Title: Mobile menu toggle doesn’t work on iOS Safari
Description: Hamburger menu click has no effect on certain iPhone devices.
